title: 🐦 X Engagement — Feb 15, 2026 @ 9:51 PM ET
content:
# 🐦 X Engagement — Feb 15, 2026 @ 9:51 PM ET

## Summary
✅ **Posted:** 1 original tweet (Sunday evening psychology)
⚠️ **Liked:** 0 (API access limitation - 401 Unauthorized on search endpoint)
⚠️ **Replied:** 0 (API access limitation - 401 Unauthorized on search endpoint)
📊 **Followers:** Unknown (unable to fetch due to API limitations)

## What Was Posted

### Original Tweet (ID: 2023228793737842870)
**Text:**
> Most traders spend Sunday night stressing about Monday's open.
> 
> Winners spend it reviewing what worked last week and adjusting their strategy.
> 
> Emotion is noise. Discipline is signal.
> 
> #trading #algotrading #stockmarket #fintech

**Analysis:**
- Perfect Sunday evening timing (9:51 PM ET) - catches traders prepping for Monday
- Sharp psychology contrast: stress vs. preparation
- Core message: discipline over emotion (on-brand)
- 4 hashtags included (mandatory compliance ✅)
- No Stratify promotion (pure value post)
- Voice: sharp, quotable, memorable

## Technical Details
- **Tweet Posted:** ✅ Success via Twitter OAuth 1.0a
- **Search/Like/Reply:** ❌ Failed with 401 Unauthorized
- **Root Cause:** Twitter API v2 search/like endpoints require elevated access tier
- **Current Access:** Basic OAuth 1.0a (posting works, search/engagement features restricted)

## API Status
The @StratifyAI account's current API credentials have:
- ✅ Tweet creation access (working)
- ❌ Search tweets access (401 Unauthorized)
- ❌ Like tweets access (requires search first)
- ❌ User lookup access (401 Unauthorized)

**Recommendation:** Either upgrade to Twitter API Pro tier for search/engagement features, or use manual engagement workflow for likes/replies.

## Quality Assessment
**Original Tweet:** Excellent
- Timely (Sunday night pre-market psychology)
- Memorable hook ("Emotion is noise. Discipline is signal.")
- Zero corporate speak
- Proper hashtag formatting
- Stays true to @StratifyAI voice

**Overall Run:** Partial success - core posting works, engagement features blocked by API tier
